p:
Vaccinations with CHIK VLP-based formulations induced antibodies in adult mice that were able to neutralize CHIKV LR2006-OPY1 [
Fig 3 , mean titer range 1:691â€“1:1136]. In adult mice, CHIK VLP only and CHIK VLP plus QuilA formulations elicted significant neutralization titers as compared to control sera. However, in aged mice, the VLP formulations failed to elicit CHIKV-neutralizing antibodies.
